ResumeParserData.Experience: Product Manager	,HSBC  Manchester, UK	,2019 - Present  At HSBC, Oliver led the development and launch of innovative financial products, significantly increasing customer acquisition. He collaborated with cross-functional teams to ensure seamless product integration, resulting in a 25% growth in market share.  Product Manager	,Barclays Bank  Manchester, UK	,2016 - 2019  Oliver managed a diverse product portfolio, enhancing customer satisfaction and achieving a 20% growth in revenue. His strategic planning and market analysis were instrumental in driving product success.  Product Manager	,Lloyds Bank  Manchester, UK	,2013 - 2016  At Lloyds Bank, Oliver directed product lifecycle management, resulting in a 15% increase in market share. He focused on aligning product features with customer needs and market trends.  Product Manager	,Royal Bank of Scotland  Manchester, UK	,2010 - 2013  Oliver oversaw product development from concept to launch, ensuring market fit and customer satisfaction. His role involved extensive stakeholder engagement and process optimization.  Product Manager	,NatWest Bank  Manchester, UK	,2007 - 2010  At NatWest, Oliver managed product portfolios, driving innovation and market growth. He utilized customer feedback to refine product offerings and improve user experience.  Product Manager	,Halifax Bank  Manchester, UK	,2004 - 2007  Oliver's role at Halifax involved leading product innovation and development, achieving notable business growth. He worked closely with various departments to ensure successful product rollouts.  Product Manager	,Nationwide Building Society  Manchester, UK	,2001 - 2004  Oliver directed product management initiatives, focusing on customer-centric design and market competitiveness. His strategic vision contributed to a significant increase in customer loyalty.  Various Roles in Product Management	,Various UK Banks  Manchester, UK	,1994 - 2001  Oliver gained comprehensive experience in product management through various roles, building a strong foundation in banking operations and product development.

ResumeParserData.Summary: Oliver Thompson is an experienced Product Manager with a 30-year career in the UK banking sector. With a strong foundation in mathematics from a Russell Group university, he has successfully led product development initiatives for multiple renowned banks. Oliver is adept at strategic planning, market analysis, and customer relationship management, driving substantial business growth and innovation.
ResumeParserData.ExecutiveSummary: Oliver has an experience in the domain of 'Management of Companies and Enterprises', particularly in the sub-domain of 'Marketing and Sales Managers. The candidate has been working as a Product Manager at HSBC for the last 5.7 years.
ResumeParserData.ManagementSummary:
Currently, Oliver holds a Mid Management Level position, as Product Manager at HSBC. from 01/01/2019 to 05/07/2024. The candidate has a total experience of 5.7 years in this company.

Oliver holds a Mid Management Level position, as Product Manager at Barclays Bank. from 01/01/2016 to 31/12/2019. The candidate has a total experience of 4.0 years in this company.

Oliver holds a Mid Management Level position, as Product Manager at Lloyds Bank. from 01/01/2013 to 31/12/2016. The candidate has a total experience of 4.0 years in this company.

Oliver holds a Mid Management Level position, as Product Manager at Royal Bank of Scotland. from 01/01/2010 to 31/12/2013. The candidate has a total experience of 4.0 years in this company.

Oliver holds a Mid Management Level position, as Product Manager at NatWest Bank. from 01/01/2007 to 31/12/2010. The candidate has a total experience of 4.0 years in this company.

Oliver holds a Mid Management Level position, as Product Manager at Halifax Bank. from 01/01/2004 to 31/12/2007. The candidate has a total experience of 4.0 years in this company.

Oliver holds a Mid Management Level position, as Product Manager at Nationwide Building Society. from 01/01/2001 to 31/12/2004. The candidate has a total experience of 4.0 years in this company.
ResumeParserData.DetailResume:
Oliver Thompson
Address : 15 Maple Street, Manchester, England
Email : oliver.thompson@example.com
Phone : 07798 123456

Personal Statement
Oliver Thompson is an experienced Product Manager with a 30-year career in the UK banking sector. With a strong foundation in mathematics from a Russell Group university, he has successfully led product development initiatives for multiple renowned banks. Oliver is adept at strategic planning, market analysis, and customer relationship management, driving substantial business growth and innovation.

Key Skills Summary
Product Development and Management
Market Analysis and Trend Forecasting
Strategic Planning and Execution
Cross-functional Team Leadership
Customer Relationship Management
Data-driven Decision Making

Education History
University of Durham (Russell Group) 
BSc Mathematics
Graduated : 1994

Work History
Product Manager	,HSBC
Manchester, UK	,2019 - Present
At HSBC, Oliver led the development and launch of innovative financial products, significantly increasing customer acquisition. He collaborated with cross-functional teams to ensure seamless product integration, resulting in a 25% growth in market share.
Product Manager	,Barclays Bank
Manchester, UK	,2016 - 2019
Oliver managed a diverse product portfolio, enhancing customer satisfaction and achieving a 20% growth in revenue. His strategic planning and market analysis were instrumental in driving product success.
Product Manager	,Lloyds Bank
Manchester, UK	,2013 - 2016
At Lloyds Bank, Oliver directed product lifecycle management, resulting in a 15% increase in market share. He focused on aligning product features with customer needs and market trends.
Product Manager	,Royal Bank of Scotland
Manchester, UK	,2010 - 2013
Oliver oversaw product development from concept to launch, ensuring market fit and customer satisfaction. His role involved extensive stakeholder engagement and process optimization.
Product Manager	,NatWest Bank
Manchester, UK	,2007 - 2010
At NatWest, Oliver managed product portfolios, driving innovation and market growth. He utilized customer feedback to refine product offerings and improve user experience.
Product Manager	,Halifax Bank
Manchester, UK	,2004 - 2007
Oliver's role at Halifax involved leading product innovation and development, achieving notable business growth. He worked closely with various departments to ensure successful product rollouts.
Product Manager	,Nationwide Building Society
Manchester, UK	,2001 - 2004
Oliver directed product management initiatives, focusing on customer-centric design and market competitiveness. His strategic vision contributed to a significant increase in customer loyalty.
Various Roles in Product Management	,Various UK Banks
Manchester, UK	,1994 - 2001
Oliver gained comprehensive experience in product management through various roles, building a strong foundation in banking operations and product development.

Qualifications
Certified Product Manager (CPM) 
PRINCE2 Practitioner
Agile Certified Practitioner (PMI-ACP) 
Six Sigma Green Belt
Certified ScrumMaster (CSM) 

AMS - Confidential

AMS - Confidential
  of NUMPAGES
ResumeParserData.HtmlResume:
Oliver Thompson

Address: 15 Maple Street, Manchester, England
Email: oliver.thompson@example.com
Phone: 07798 123456

Personal Statement

Oliver Thompson is an experienced Product Manager with a 30-year career in the UK banking sector. With a strong foundation in mathematics from a Russell Group university, he has successfully led product development initiatives for multiple renowned banks. Oliver is adept at strategic planning, market analysis, and customer relationship management, driving substantial business growth and innovation.

Key Skills Summary

  • Product Development and Management
  • Market Analysis and Trend Forecasting
  • Strategic Planning and Execution
  • Cross-functional Team Leadership
  • Customer Relationship Management
  • Data-driven Decision Making

Education History

University of Durham (Russell Group)

  • BSc Mathematics
  • Graduated: 1994

Work History

Product Manager | HSBC
Manchester, UK | 2019 - Present
At HSBC, Oliver led the development and launch of innovative financial products, significantly increasing customer acquisition. He collaborated with cross-functional teams to ensure seamless product integration, resulting in a 25% growth in market share.

Product Manager | Barclays Bank
Manchester, UK | 2016 - 2019
Oliver managed a diverse product portfolio, enhancing customer satisfaction and achieving a 20% growth in revenue. His strategic planning and market analysis were instrumental in driving product success.

Product Manager | Lloyds Bank
Manchester, UK | 2013 - 2016
At Lloyds Bank, Oliver directed product lifecycle management, resulting in a 15% increase in market share. He focused on aligning product features with customer needs and market trends.

Product Manager | Royal Bank of Scotland
Manchester, UK | 2010 - 2013
Oliver oversaw product development from concept to launch, ensuring market fit and customer satisfaction. His role involved extensive stakeholder engagement and process optimization.

Product Manager | NatWest Bank
Manchester, UK | 2007 - 2010
At NatWest, Oliver managed product portfolios, driving innovation and market growth. He utilized customer feedback to refine product offerings and improve user experience.

Product Manager | Halifax Bank
Manchester, UK | 2004 - 2007
Oliver's role at Halifax involved leading product innovation and development, achieving notable business growth. He worked closely with various departments to ensure successful product rollouts.

Product Manager | Nationwide Building Society
Manchester, UK | 2001 - 2004
Oliver directed product management initiatives, focusing on customer-centric design and market competitiveness. His strategic vision contributed to a significant increase in customer loyalty.

Various Roles in Product Management | Various UK Banks
Manchester, UK | 1994 - 2001
Oliver gained comprehensive experience in product management through various roles, building a strong foundation in banking operations and product development.

Qualifications

  • Certified Product Manager (CPM)
  • PRINCE2 Practitioner
  • Agile Certified Practitioner (PMI-ACP)
  • Six Sigma Green Belt
  • Certified ScrumMaster (CSM)
